message: MATA will operate a regular schedule on Good Friday, April 15. Administrative offices will be closed.
Route 40 diverted. Stops: THIRD@LOONEY, THIRD@KEEL, THIRD@CHELSEA, SECOND@PEAR, will not be served.
Route 28 in service starting at the Airways transit 5:38 PM outbpond

Route 30 diverted. Stops: RIVERDALE@WINCHESTER, RIVERDALE@STARKENBURG, RIVERDALE@BIRCH RUN, RIVERDALE@CHESAPEAKE, RIVERDALE@RAINES, RIVERDALE@FOX HEDGE, RIVERDALE@ROCKINGHAM, RIVERDALE@BORDEAUX, SHELBY@RIVERDALE, SHELBY@BENOIT, SHELBY@ROSS, will not be served.
